typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		NameStyle as boolean,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AzureSQLCustomerTable
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AzureSQLDimCustomerTable
AzureSQLCustomerTable derive(CreatedhashKey = sha1(FirstName+LastName+CompanyName)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, AzureSQLDimCustomerTable exists(CreatedhashKey == HashKey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ChecksForHashKey
ChecksForHashKey, AzureSQLDimCustomerTable lookup(AzureSQLCustomerTable@CustomerID == AzureSQLDimCustomerTable@CustomerID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupForCustomerID
LookupForCustomerID derive(InsertedDate = iif(isNull(InsertedDate), currentTimestamp(), InsertedDate),
		UpdatedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> AddLookupDates
AddLookupDates alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> ChooseUpsertIf
ChooseUpsertIf sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		CustomerID as integer,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['CustomerID'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID = AzureSQLCustomerTable@CustomerID,
		Title = AzureSQLCustomerTable@Title,
		FirstName = AzureSQLCustomerTable@FirstName,
		MiddleName = AzureSQLCustomerTable@MiddleName,
		LastName = AzureSQLCustomerTable@LastName,
		InsertedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		HashKey = CreatedhashKey
	)) ~> DimCustomerTable
